Name: Pirate's Solitaire
About the game: Outwit the old sea dog and seize the pirates' gold! Play solitaire right on the deck of the reavers' ship. Levels of varying difficulty promise several hours of exciting gameplay, and unique golden cards make the game even more interesting.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Pirate's Solitaire? Check out the release date (Mar 16, 2022), developer insights from Creobit, and a complete game summary.
